docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: SIMPLE, fast and reliable new tests that detect everything from drug abuse to strep throat to acquired immune deficiency syndrome are being developed for use in doctors' offices, outpatient clinics, corporations, and possibly even in the home.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A GENTLE hand has outperformed the traumatic technology commonly used to treat breathing problems of premature babies.
